tti.method: React Native Performance Monitor or manual stopwatch
tti.notes: MANUAL: Start app in production mode (npm run start -- --no-dev --minify), measure time from app icon tap to interactive. Average over 3 runs.

fps.method: React Native Performance Monitor FPS counter
fps.notes: MANUAL: Enable FPS counter, navigate to each tab, scroll/interact, record FPS values. Test on low-end device simulator if possible.

bundle_size.method: npx expo export --platform all && du -sh dist/
bundle_size.notes: MANUAL: Run expo export, measure dist/ folder size. Separate iOS and Android if possible.

memory.notes: MANUAL: Profile app while navigating through all 5 screens, record peak memory usage. Check for memory leaks.

instructions.step_1: Run production build: npm run start -- --no-dev --minify
instructions.step_2: Measure TTI (cold start, warm start) - average 3 runs each
instructions.step_3: Enable Performance Monitor, record FPS for each tab
instructions.step_5: Measure: du -sh dist/ (or dir dist /s on Windows)
instructions.step_6: Profile memory with Xcode Instruments or Android Studio
instructions.step_7: Replace null values above with actual measurements
